8f24835b-9697-4860-917d-e00e318e7974.name: Directional
8f24835b-9697-4860-917d-e00e318e7974.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

b5a86826-db6f-41d0-bf9e-7fbdd2610bd2.name: Tough Skin
b5a86826-db6f-41d0-bf9e-7fbdd2610bd2.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

5f4b78eb-6fe3-46bc-821e-0049e2e9cba1.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

0b3b55ec-47c1-4d90-bb50-3b3c15e47467.name: Oxygen Storage
0b3b55ec-47c1-4d90-bb50-3b3c15e47467.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

a040ea59-0e47-4356-9710-7ffc89aeb3e6.name: Oxygen Storage
a040ea59-0e47-4356-9710-7ffc89aeb3e6.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

94e6c1ea-91a5-4f65-a5e2-8920952362f6.name: Oxygen Storage
94e6c1ea-91a5-4f65-a5e2-8920952362f6.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

42dd34f7-d437-4640-91e6-887d62fa8a77.name: Oxygen Storage
42dd34f7-d437-4640-91e6-887d62fa8a77.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

b17f170e-447c-4727-9e76-e9e40a95aedc.name: Oxygen Storage
b17f170e-447c-4727-9e76-e9e40a95aedc.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

c4d5b9eb-0b7e-4450-b748-929f82a9378b.name: Diffuse
c4d5b9eb-0b7e-4450-b748-929f82a9378b.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

7807ffdd-6edc-4ef1-a3e8-ff789d74de9b.name: Homogenous
7807ffdd-6edc-4ef1-a3e8-ff789d74de9b.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

546eaef1-bb7a-4719-8294-8a5977233e17.name: No Blood
546eaef1-bb7a-4719-8294-8a5977233e17.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

8f532ca2-3320-4667-9cb0-65a48c9441f9.name: No Brain
8f532ca2-3320-4667-9cb0-65a48c9441f9.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

50d4fb9c-3c9a-4b9a-8afd-55fe29c27040.name: No Eyes
50d4fb9c-3c9a-4b9a-8afd-55fe29c27040.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

193d2fb6-9fa3-4f48-9a54-09911c0ad420.name: No Head
193d2fb6-9fa3-4f48-9a54-09911c0ad420.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

bf84e253-505b-40c3-9c28-85f1f0b8a300.name: No Neck
bf84e253-505b-40c3-9c28-85f1f0b8a300.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

f22e9049-5650-4dd4-8d5a-a0bea60a9b94.name: No Vitals
f22e9049-5650-4dd4-8d5a-a0bea60a9b94.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

e0fdc958-2fdd-4dbb-9d8f-8771eccd037f.name: Unliving
e0fdc958-2fdd-4dbb-9d8f-8771eccd037f.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
